posts.post_content:
As my collecting interests get smaller and smaller, I have one last set that still excites me ....the 1910 T210 Old Mill set!

I currently have 21 T210s as well as a 2 duplicates.

Here are the 24 catchers I'd still like to add to my collection at some point:


1) SHIELDS, AUGUSTA TOURISTS (SERIES 1)
2) RAY KREBS, COLUMBUS FOXES (SERIES 1)
3) ANDY PETTIT, SAVANNAH INDIANS (SERIES 1)
4) HENRY COTE, PORTSMOUTH TRUCKERS (SERIES 2)
5) BERT FISHER, ROANOKE TIGERS (SERIES 2)
6) TOM MESSITT, RICHMOND COLTS (PORTRAIT) (SERIES 2)
7) WALTER SCHMIDT, ROANOKE TIGERS (SERIES 2)
8) BARNEY BURCH, HOUSTON BUFFALOES (RED BORDER) (SERIES 3)
9)) BARNEY BURCH,  (ORANGE ORDER) PORT. (SERIES 3)
10) BROOKS GORDON,  (WACO NAVIGATORS) RED BORDER) (SERIES 3)
11) BROOKS GORDON, WACO NAVIGATORS (ORANGE BORDER) (SERIES 3)
12) HENRY HENNINGER (HINNINGER) (SERIES 3)
13) GEORGE YANTZ , SAN  ANTONIO BRONCHOS (RED BORDER) (SERIES 3)
14) GEORGE YANTZ (ORANGE BORDER) (SERIES 3)
15) F. M.HUNTER, POINT PLEASANT (SERIES 4)
16) OSCAR HARTLEY, ANDERSON ELECTRICIANS (BATTING) (SERIES 5)
17) ANDY ROTH, SPARTANBURG SPARTANS (CATCHING) (SERIES 5)
18) IVEY WINGO, GREENVILLE SPINNERS (SERIES 5)
19) J.HICKS, FRANKFORT STATEMEN (SERIES 6)(CATCHING)
20) GEORGE DAILEY, GOLDSBORO GIANTS (SERIES 7)
21) A.J. DUSSAULT (DUSSALT), ROCKY MOUNT RAILROADERS (SERIES 7)
22) LOUIE HOBBS, RALEIGH RED BIRDS (SERIES 7)
23) HUB HART, MONTGOMERY CLIMBERS (SERIES 8)
24) JIM LAFITTE,  ORLEANS PELICANS (SERIES 8)

If anyone has any EX or better cards with clean fronts, please send me a front scan as well as your asking price!

Thanks in advance,

Patrick

Patrick--

Send me an email. I have a low grade Dussault.

[url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url]

Cheers,
Mike
